title: [Large-Scale] Overcoming Digital Learning Barriers and Asynchronous Online Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and experience with online learning
context.additional_context: A blended course combining asynchronous online learning and face-to-face instruction in a digital device-provided environment, focusing on bridging learners' digital competency gaps

learning_goals: Learners will identify three or more accessibility barriers in digital learning environments and propose solutions.
Learners will complete asynchronous online math problem-solving activities with an 80% or higher completion rate.
Learners will establish strategies for balancing work and learning through case analysis of digital tool applications.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
